articles.title: U.S. Assistant Secretary of State and His Party Leave
articles.content:
U.S. Assistant Secretary of State and His Party Leave
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- U.S. Assistant Secretary of State Christopher Hill and his party left here today.

articles.title: 1st Anniversary of Publication of October 4 Declaration Marked
articles.content:
1st Anniversary of Publication of October 4 Declaration Marked
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held in Pyongyang on Friday to mark the 1st anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Ki Nam, chairpersons of the friendly parties, leading officials of power organs and social organizations, officials of ministries and national institutions, people from all walks of life in Pyongyang and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, in his report said that the historic October 4 declaration is action  guidelines and a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration as the above-said historic declaration comprehensively indicates overall ways for developing the inter-Korean relations, achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula, co-prosperity of the nation and the country's reunification, guided by the main spirit of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 He stressed that the adoption of the October 4 declaration which fully reflects the desire and wishes of the nation made it possible for the north and the south to expand and develop the economic cooperation for the balanced development of the Korean nation's economy and co-prosperity on the principle of common interests and co-prosperity and mutual accommodation and positively conduct multi-faced cooperation for glorifying the time-honored history and advantageous culture of the nation.
					
					 He referred to the fact that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has wisely steered the patriotic movement of all Koreans for reunification to implement the October 4 declaration with his tireless energetic leadership.
					
					 The reporter called on all the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas to set store by and consolidate the good results gained through the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and hold higher the banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 He also underlined the need for the Koreans of all strata in the north and the south and overseas to strongly reject the servile sycophantic and treacherous acts of the south Korean conservative ruling forces and their confrontational moves against the nation and reunification and decisively frustrate all sorts of interference and arbitrary practices of foreign forces.
					
					 He called for expanding and strengthening All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration, a solidarity organization for nationwide reunification movement grouping different political parties and organizations and figures at home and abroad, and boosting the solidarity among Koreans in the north and the south and overseas.
					
					 He underlined the need for all of them to positively support the independent politics of attaching importance to the nation, Songun politics and intensify the nationwide struggle for independent reunification and peace and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to German President
articles.content:
Greetings to German President
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to German President Horst Kohler on the occasion of the national day of Germany. 
					 Expressing belief that the cooperative ties between the DPRK and Germany would grow stronger in the bilateral interests, the message wished the people of Germany progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Lesotho
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Lesotho
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on October 1 sent a message of greetings to Letsie III, King of Lesotho, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its national independence. 
					 Kim in his message sincerely wished him good health and happiness and the friendly people of Lesotho prosperity and welfare.

articles.title: Congratulatory Messages to Foreign Ministers of Burkina Faso and Mauritius
articles.content:
Congratulatory Messages to Foreign Ministers of Burkina Faso and Mauritius
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a congratulatory message to Bedouma Alain Yoda on Sept. 30 on the latter's appointment as minister of State and minister of Foreign Affairs and Regional Cooperation of Burkina Faso. He sent a similar message to Arvin Boolell on Oct. 2 on the latter's appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs, Regional Integration and International Trade of Mauritius.
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and the above-said two countries would grow stronger in the future, the messages wished them successes in their new jobs.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves for Retrogressive Revision of History Textbooks Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves for Retrogressive Revision of History Textbooks Blasted
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Ministry of Education issued a statement on Friday assailing the Lee Myung Bak group for crying out for making a retrogressive revision of history textbooks for high schools in south Korea to serve its pro-U.S. and "anti-communist purpose" these days under the motto of "eradicating the leftover of the left wing" and "intensifying education for security against communism".
					 The statement said:
					
					 The group's proposed retrogressive revision of the above-said textbooks is designed to distort and delete the parts of the modern history of the Korean nation dealing with its patriotic struggle to put an end to foreign forces' aggression and colonial rule and achieve its sovereignty, malignantly defame the dignified socialist system in the DPRK and fan up bitterness toward it. 
					
					 It is also aimed at falsifying the truth behind the hideous crimes including the massacre of participants in the April 3 popular uprising on Jeju Island committed by the U.S. imperialists and the political incidents perpetrated by them and the successive puppet fascist dictatorial regimes and their acts of treachery, whitewashing them and marring the significance of the historic Pyongyang summits in a bid to justify the group's anti-reunification policy. 
					
					 What the Lee group is doing now is more vicious and sinister than what the successive south Korean fascist ruling quarters committed against the nation and history. It is something unprecedented in history. 
					
					 Its moves to rewrite history textbooks are unpardonable as they are designed to serve the criminal purpose of reinforcing the foundation of the pro-U.S. conservative forces and openly implanting bitterness towards compatriots into the minds of the rising generation in a bid to block reconciliation and unity of the nation and weaken and dampen the desire for independence, democracy and reunification which has grown stronger in south Korea since the publication of the June 15 declaration.

articles.title: Foundation Day of Korea Marked
articles.content:
Foundation Day of Korea Marked
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- An event was held to mark the Foundation Day of Korea in front of King Tangun's Mausoleum on Friday.
					 Present there were Chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party Kim Yong Dae who is chairman of the National Reconciliation Council, Chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Korean Chondoist Chongu Party Ryu Mi Yong who is chairwoman of the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation, Vice-Chairman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland O Ik Je, Presidium Member of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of the Fatherland Kang Ryon Hak, Director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland An Kyong Ho, officials concerned and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 At first there was a memorial service for Tangun.
					
					 Then Vice-Chairman of the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation Kang Chol Won made a report.
					
					 Recalling that the Foundation Day of Korea is significantly commemorated every year, he said that the Korean nation is paying high tribute to President Kim Il Sung, who performed immortal exploits for the development of the national history by making sure that the ancestral father of the Korean nation was found and King Tangun's Mausoleum was built as a magnificent edifice, and extending warm thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is entirely thanks to Songun that the Korean nation became able to hold significant events on the Foundation Day of Korea, he said, adding that the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il serves as patriotic banner and a treasured sword for defending the nation. 
					
					 He noted that in order to overcome the difficulties and trials before the Koreans in their efforts to achieve national reunification and steadily glorify the June 15 era of reunification all of them should settle the issue of the country's reunification by their concerted efforts from the stand of independence, placing the dignity and interests of the nation above anything else.
					
					 He accused the Lee Myung Bak conservative regime in south Korea of working hard to defame the main spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and making a mess of the successes made in the efforts to implement them, while getting frantic with sycophancy towards the U.S. and the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 He called on all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas to unite close in the idea of "By our nation itself" and thus smash the U.S. imperialists and south Korean ultra-right conservative forces' moves to perpetuate the national split and open up a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Proves Successful in Asian Women's Boxing Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Proves Successful in Asian Women's Boxing Championships
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Boxers of the DPRK proved successful in the 4th Asian Women's Boxing Championships held in India from Sept. 23 to 28.
					 The championships brought together nearly 80 ace boxers from 10 odd countries and regions, including the DPRK, China and Kazakhstan.
					
					 There DPRK boxers won four gold, two silver and three bronze medals and Kim Hyang OK was awarded the prize for combativeness.
					
					 Jong Ok placed first in the 46kg class bout, Kim Hye Yong in the 60kg, Ri Hyon Hwa in the 63kg and Ri Suk Yong in the 66kg.
					
					 Kim Hyang Ok and Jang Un Hui snatched silver medals each in the 50kg and the 70kg. Ri Jong Hyang, Tong Song Hye and Yun Kum Ju bagged bronze medals in the 48kg, the 52kg and the 57kg.

articles.title: Time-honored Stonework in Kaesong Area
articles.content:
Time-honored Stonework in Kaesong Area
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- There are lots of time-honored stone sculptures in Kaesong area of the DPRK, which are illustrative of the wisdom and talent of the nation in the period of the Koryo Dynasty.
					 The tombs of King Kongmin, the 31st king of Koryo, and the queen lying at the foot of Mt. Pongmyong in Haeson-ri, Kaesong City, are magnificent in its architectural structure with many delicate sculptural decorations.
					
					 Embossed on the stones enclosing the tombs are twelve spirits of terrain which are so lifelike that they seem to fly in the sky on thick clouds. Excellent sculptural art can be gathered from the stone rails with graceful decorative patterns and stone staircases, a pair of stone posts in front of the tomb, an offertory table, stone lanterns and stone sheep and tigers standing alternately around the tombs.
					
					 Typical of the stone statues around the tomb of King Kongmin are statues of four civil officials on the second platform and four military officers on the third platform.
					
					 The stone human statues, about 3.3 meters high, were cut from monolithic granite. They vividly delineate their characteristic features while giving a superb rendition to the grandeur of stone sculpture with concise and clear cut.
					
					 The monument to Taegakguksa of the Ryongthong Temple in Ryonghung-dong, Kaesong City, stands on a stone sculpture of a turtle with its four legs planted sturdily on the base stone and its neck stretched forward. The image of the turtle looks dignified and the phoenix and flower patterns embossed low on the front and rear sides of the monument are appreciated to be the most beautiful among the monument decorations which had been created by that time.
					
					 The seven-storied Pagoda of the Hyonhwa Temple preserved at the Koryo Museum is large in size and grand in style. Many images of Buddha sculptured on each story of the pagoda are exquisite and lifelike.
					
					 Nine dragons writhing, entangled, are vividly sculptured at the head of the monument of the Hyonhwa Temple. No less excellent are the depiction of a gold crow and a white rabbit, representing the sun and the moon respectively, done at the upper part of the facade of the monument.
					
					 And two wriggling dragon sculptures flanking the monument remind the viewers of living dragons.
					
					 There are many other stonework of the period of Koryo in the Kaesong area, including the sculpture of a dragon head at the site of the Manwoldae Royal Palace.

articles.title: Songun Idea Embodying Principle of Independence
articles.content:
Songun Idea Embodying Principle of Independence
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Songun idea of the Workers' Party of Korea thoroughly embodies the fundamental demand of the Juche idea for advocating and realizing independence of the popular masses, sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					 The Juche idea clarified for the first time in history that independence is the life and soul of popular masses and the country and nation and that all revolutionary struggles are for the realization of independence.
					
					 The principle of independence and the requirement for the realization of independence made clear by the Juche idea is thoroughly embodied in the Songun idea.
					
					 The Songun idea attaching importance to arms is mainly aimed at advocating and carrying through independence of the people, the country and the nation.
					
					 The realization of independence can be unthinkable without arms. It is because all manner of counterrevolutionary forces and imperialists resort to violence in trampling down independence of the popular masses and the sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					
					 The historical experience and the present reality prove that any progress of the socialist cause, dignity of the nation and the new independent world would have been unthinkable without the powerful armed forces.
					
					 The Songun politics is an independent political mode which enables people to carry on the revolution and construction with their own efforts in accordance with their faith and will in reliance upon the matchless armed forces.
					
					 The independent mode of politics is the method to solve one's problem in an independent way by one's own efforts with the interest of the country and nation in the centre.
					
					 The Songun politics is a model of the independent politics. By attaching primary attention to increasing the military power, the kernel of the national strength, the politics makes it possible to scathingly frustrate all sorts of pressure and interference by outside forces and the aggression moves of the imperialists, to firmly maintain the principle of independence under any conditions and circumstances and to carry out all the work in accordance with one's own decision and judgment.
					
					 The WPK, with its Songun leadership, has fortified the military position of the revolution with the People's Army as the core as an invincible fortress, which is the basic foundation for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Authorities' Repression under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Repression under Fire in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties of south Korea have protested against the puppet authorities' crackdown on the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration.
					 The Democratic Labor Party called a meeting of its executive chairmen on Sept. 29 to denounce the seizure, search and arrest campaign conducted by the puppet intelligence service and police against the Solidarity. 
					
					 The recent smear campaign is a continuation of the crackdown on the candlelight actions, the DLP pointed out, declaring that it would form a measure committee against the Lee Myung Bak "government's" suppression of the candlelight actions and crackdown under the pretext of "security" and vigorously cope with such smear campaign. It also stated that it would promptly make up a group for probing the truth behind the repression of the Solidarity and thoroughly probe about the retaliatory investigation and abuse of the "National Security Law".
					
					 The Democratic Party of south Korea asserted that the crackdown on the Solidarity conducted across south Korea revealed the Lee Myung Bak "government's" intention to pursue the threatening policy toward people as the past military dictatorial regimes did.
					
					 The authorities are repressing even the reunification movement of civic and public organizations to maintain their regime, it noted, saying that the suppression of leading members of the Solidarity on charges of "violation of the NSL" would possibly further aggravate the south-north relations.
					
					 It urged the authorities to immediately disband the "combined investigation team" targeting against opposition parties and civic and public organizations.
					
					 Charging that unreasonable suppression is going on under the pretext of security in the wake of the crackdown on the Socialist Workers' Federation, the New Progressive Party of south Korea declared that it would take the lead in the struggle to get the NSL, an evil law of the times, abrogated.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Suppression under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Suppression under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification released a statement on Sept. 28, calling for strong resistance to the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime hell-bent on the fascist suppression.
					 The statement charged that the regime is making a sweeping roundup on a large scale against the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, a reunification movement organization which has taken the lead in the struggle for national reunification, by dint of the "National Security Law" when the first anniversary of the October 4 declaration is coming near.
					
					 Saying that such reckless suppression intensified under the pretext of "security" can never be pardoned, the statement stressed the need for the people from all walks of life to unite and turn out in the struggle to frustrate the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime's extremely violent suppression, policy for deteriorating the living of people and anti-June 15 rowdyism.
					
					 The People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law" and other civic and public organizations, too, called a press conference outside the Intelligence Service in Seoul on Sept. 29 in denunciation of the puppet authorities' crackdown upon the Solidarity.
					
					 Speakers at the press conference pointed out that the suppression by the Intelligence Service is being intensified after the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak "government". They described the repression of the reunification movement organization as an anti-reunification and traitorous deed of totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Warning that the "government" would face a stern punishment by the people if it continues resorting to the anachronistic repression, they demanded the abrogation of the NSL and disbandment of the IS.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Institute for Civil Rights Studies in south Korea under the Solidarity and the Headquarters of the Movement for the Withdrawal of the U.S. Forces issued statements on Sept. 28, at which they demanded halt to the repression of the Solidarity and release of those arrested.

articles.title: Korean Exhibition Held in Vietnam
articles.content:
Korean Exhibition Held in Vietnam
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was held at the Ho Chi Minh Museum in Ho Chi Minh City from Sept. 26 to Oct. 1 to mark the 50th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to Vietnam and the 60th birthday of the DPRK.
					 On display in the exhibition hall were famous works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos showing their immortal exploits, books and photos introducing Songun Korea, handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people and photos dealing with the history of friendship between the two countries.
					
					 Attending its opening ceremony were personages of different circles and popular masses in Ho Chi Minh City including the vice-chairman of the City People's Committee. Present on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Vietnam and staff members of the embassy and members of the delegation of the Korean General Bureau of Exhibition.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Ho Chi Minh City People's Committee said that the peoples of the two countries have long developed the relationship of friendship and mutual understanding provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He expressed belief that the exhibition would greatly contribute to deepening friendship and understanding between the two countries by providing the Vietnamese people with an opportunity to have a deep understanding of the DPRK and the achievements made by its government and people over the past six decades.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Marked in Mexico
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Marked in Mexico
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, issued a statement on Sept. 24 on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Noting that October is a significant month to the Korean people, he said in the statement: President Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of revolutionary struggle against the Japanese imperialists' military occupation of Korea in his early years. He formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union in 1926 and founded the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945, less than two months after the liberation of the country.
					
					 The statement recalled that under the wise leadership of the WPK the Korean people overcame the harsh ordeals of war enforced by the U.S., gave a telling blow to the U.S. imperialists and fulfilled the historic task of socialist industrialization in a short span of time.
					
					 The might of the WPK with General Secretary Kim Jong Il as its general secretary, the general staff of the revolution, was evidently manifested in the fact that it powerfully aroused the Korean people to the struggle for defending socialism despite the collapse of socialist countries in Eastern Europe and the successive grave difficulties, it stressed.

articles.title: Parten de Pyongyang Christopher Hill y su comitiva
articles.content:
Parten de Pyongyang Christopher Hill y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ATCC) -- Partieron hoy de esta capital el asistente del secretario de Estado norteamericano, Christopher Hill, y su comitiva.

articles.title: Acto central por primer aniversario de Declaracion del 4 de Octubre
articles.content:
Acto central por primer aniversario de Declaracion del 4 de Octubre
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en esta capital el acto central por el primer aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. 
					Estuvieron presentes Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Ki Nam, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los cuadros directivos de organismos del poder y de entidades sociales, los funcionarios de los ministerios y organos centrales, los trabajadores capitalinos de distintos estratos y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Yang Hyong Sop, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.
					
					La historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre es la guia de accion y programa practico que sintetiza y aclara globalmente los remedios para lograr el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur, la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, la coprosperidad de la nacion y la reunificacion del pais basandose en el espiritu fundamental de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, comenzo el orador y continuo:
					
					La aprobacion de ese documento, que refleja ampliamente la aspiracion y la demanda de la nacion, permitio a ambas partes coreanas ampliar y desarrollar en el principio de la prosperidad e intereses comunes y del intercambio mutuamente beneficioso la cooperacion economica para el desarrollo equilibrado de la economia nacional y la coprosperidad e impulsar dinamicamente otras labores de cooperacion multilateral para glorificar la larga historia y la cultura sobresaliente de la nacion.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il condujo sabiamente con su incansable y energica orientacion el movimiento nacional patriotico por la reunificacion enderezada a la implementacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben apreciar y consolidar los excelentes frutos logrados a traves de la lucha por ejecutar dichas declaraciones y levantar mas alto la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Los habitantes de distintos estratos del Norte, el Sur y de ultramar deben rechazar fuertemente los humillantes actos serviles a las grandes potencias y las maniobras conflictivas antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de las fuerzas conservadoras en el poder del Sur de Corea y frustrar tajantemente la intervencion y las arbitrariedades de toda indole de las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Es preciso ampliar el Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio, organizacion solidaria pannacional por el movimiento de reunificacion a que estan afiliados  el mayor numero de partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades en el interior y el exterior del pais, y consolidar la solidaridad tripartita entre el Norte, el Sur y el ultramar. 
					
					 Toda la nacion del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar debe apoyar activamente la politica independiente, la de Songun (priorizacion militar), que dan importancia a la nacion, y desarrollar con mas dinamismo la lucha pannacional por la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad de la patria.

articles.title: Simposio sobre la historica declaracion del 4 de Octubre
articles.content:
Simposio sobre la historica declaracion del 4 de Octubre
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar ayer en esta capital el simposio por el primer aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					En la ocasion participaron el presidente del CC del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea Kim Yong Dae, la presidenta  del CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-u Ryu Mi Yong, el director del Secretariado del CC del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria Kim Wan Su, los funcionarios directivos de las organizaciones sociales, los funcionarios interesados y  trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					En el certamen intervinieron el presidente del CC del PSDC Kim Yong Dae, el presidente de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales Thae Hyong Chol, el  director del Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria An Kyong Ho, el presidente del Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria Ri Jong Hyok y la presidenta del CC de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea Ro Song Sil.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que con la aprobacion y la publicacion de la "Declaracion para el Desarrollo de las Relaciones Norte-Sur, la Paz y Prosperidad" de octubre del ano pasado se preparo la firme garantia  capaz de promover mas energicamente la epoca de la reunificacion del 15 de junio y subrayaron que esta declaracion absolutamente apoyada y aplaudida en el interior y exterior del pais es la materializacion brillante y el precioso fruto de la destacada idea y la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Explicaron y argumentaron que la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre es un documento comun practico que ilumino el verdadero camino para mantener y materializar el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" presentado en la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y es una bandera estimulante que promueve energicamente el desarrollo independiente de la nacion y su reunificacion.
					
					Anadieron que la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre presenta perfectamente los medios y metodos practicos para mantener y materializar activamente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y desarrollar  las relaciones  Norte-Sur a favor de la  reunificacion basandose en el respeto mutuo y la confianza y de esta manera sirve de guia programatica que ilumina el camino capaz de abrir una nueva fase para el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Esta declaracion es la pacifica para poner fin a las relaciones hostiles militares entre el Norte y el Sur y garantizar la distension y la paz en la Peninsula Coreana, anadieron y se refirieron a los asuntos relacionados con las medidas que se presentan en la ejecucion de la declaracion.
					
					Todos los coreanos deben frustrar con las fuerzas unidas las maquinaciones de las fuerzas divisionistas del interior y exterior y lograr la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria al levantarse en la lucha por la materializacion de las declaraciones arriba mencionadas con la bandera del Songun (priorizacion militar) en alto.

articles.title: Denuncian revision del manual de historia por banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Denuncian revision del manual de historia por banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ATCC) -- El vocero del Ministerio de Educacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica este viernes una declaracion con motivo de que ultimamente, la banda de Lee Myung Bak habla tanto de cambiar el contenido del manual de historia, que se utiliza en las escuelas superiores del Sur de Corea, en sentido proyanqui y "anticomunista" bajo pretextos de la "liquidacion de los residuos de la fraccion izquierda" y el "fortalecimiento de la educacion en la seguridad publica anticomunista".
					Su texto resumido sigue:
					
					La revision del manual de historia, que pretende la banda de Lee Myung Bak, consiste en tergiversar y borrar la historia contemporanea de la nacion coreana coronada con la lucha patriotica contra la invasion y el colonialismo de las fuerzas foraneas y por el logro de la soberania nacional y en censurar siniestramente el muy digno regimen socialista de la RPDC y fomentar la conciencia hostil a esta.
					
					Igualmente, se encamina a tergiversar y enturbiar la verdad de los sucesos politicos y crimenes antinacionales cometidos por los imperialistas norteamericanos y en los anteriores regimenes de los dictadores fascistas titeres del Sur de Corea, inclusive el genocidio de los participantes en la Sublevacion Popular del 3 de Abril en la isla Jeju, y a justificar su politica anti-reunificacion e invalidar la importancia de los historicos encuentros cumbres de Pyongyang.
					
					La actual conducta repugnante de la banda de Lee resulta la locura sin precedentes y mas siniestra y malsana que las acciones antinacionales y antihistoricas cometidas por los sucesivos gobernantes fascistas del Sur de Corea.  
					
					Las maniobras de la banda de Lee para modificar el contenido del manual de historia son nunca tolerables porque parten del intento criminal de impedir la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y de sofocar el clima por la independencia, democracia y reunificacion, que se acentuo en el Sur de Corea despues de la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, al consolidar la base de las fuerzas conservadoras proyanquis y sembrar abiertamente en las nuevas generaciones la conciencia hostil a los connacionales.
